name: MyPets
description:
MyPets

The aim of the game is to tame animals. You have to tame the animals in order and complete the list.

- you have to tame animals by feeding them

- you have to eat watermelon to get energy

- you have to press the E key to interact

- resources will be refreshed in 2 minutes

Control

Character Movement  :  W,A,S,D Keys

Interaction   : E Keys

Pause Menu : Esc Keys
